income_messages:
From: h*********o@gmx.com
To: CRAWLER
Time: 2023-04-30 22:12:44
SUBJECT:   Dear Sir/Madam,
  Dear Sir/Madam,
My name is Mr. Heitor Castro, a Portuguese lawyer based in Lisbon - Portugal
I´m sending this mail to you regarding some huge fund left behind by my late client before his tragic death.
However, I am contacting you once again because I believe you will be in a better position to execute this business transaction with me.
This transaction is above board and I Look forward to your response. Please, kindly respond to my personal email for more details.
Kind regards,
Mr. Heitor Castro
Personal Email: 
heitocastro@gmx.com
From: h*********o@gmx.com
To: wm35861@l******s.email
Time: 2023-05-01 10:43:14
SUBJECT: Response
Dear Amy, 
 This is in response to your mail.  Thanks for responding to me. Kindly treat this personal.  If this partnership proposal offends your moral ethics do accept my sincere apology, however, if on the contrary you wish to achieve this goal with us, kindly respond and indicate your interest. 
 I wish to inform you that, there is an unclaimed Permanent Life Insurance Policy held by our deceased client, the policy pertains to an unclaimed Payable-on-Death (POD) valued at USD$3,700,000.00 with a Bank here in Lisbon Portugal. 
 The policyholder is our deceased client, from Canada who worked with an Energy company here in Europe, he died alongside with the direct policy beneficiaries his wife and 2 children were among the 35 people that were confirmed dead in Indonesia Earthquake during family holiday in January 2021, details can be find here https://news.un.org/en/story/2021/01/1082242 
 Since his death, no one has come forward for the policy benefit and all my efforts to locate his relatives have proved unsuccessful, the insurance company code stipulates that “insured permanent policies" not claimed must be turned over to the unclaimed policy division of the company after three (3) years for onward transfer to the government as unclaimed. 
 Therefore, I ask for your consent to be in partnership with us for the claim of this Insurance benefit I do not know if you are related to our deceased client but If you permit us to present you as the Insurance beneficiary, all proceeds will be processed and released to us, I wish to point out that upon conclusion the policy benefit will be shared equally between us as the Insurance company is under no obligations to contact any external members of his family therefore holding the policy benefits in their bank. 
 Our law firm do have the necessary documents to expedite the process in a highly professional and confidential manner and the success rate is 101% guaranteed. we will provide all the relevant documents to substantiate the claim as the beneficiary, all that is required of you is your consent and following our directives as this policy benefit claim requires a high level of confidentiality as it may take up to Fifteen (15) business days to be concluded from the date we apply for the benefit. 
 Once we receive your positive response, our principal attorney will start communicating with you directly from our official law firm email address, as well provide you with details on the legitimate procedures and further clarifications, including official website and legal identifications. 
 Your earliest response will be highly appreciated. 
 Kind regards, 
 Mr.  Heitor Castro 
 Personal Email: HeitoCastro@gmx.com 
 Sent: Sunday, April 30, 2023 at 10:12 PM From: "Amy" <wm35861@liammacs.email> To: heitocastro@gmx.com Subject: Re: Dear Sir/Madam, 
Dear Mr. Heitor Castro, 
Thank you for reaching out to me regarding your late client's funds. I am interested in learning more about this opportunity. Could you please provide me with more details about the funds and what would be required of me to execute this business with you? 
Also, I would appreciate it if you could provide me with some form of identification or verification of your identity and profession as a Portuguese lawyer. 
Looking forward to hearing back from you soon.
Best wishes, 
Amy

SUBJECT: Re:   Dear Sir/Madam,

Best wishes,
Amy
From: wm35861@l******s.email
To: h*********o@gmx.com
Time: 2023-05-01 13:12:43
SUBJECT: Re: Response
Dear Amy,
Thank you for your response. I understand your concerns and I am willing to provide you with all the necessary information and documentation to prove my identity and profession as a Portuguese lawyer. 
Regarding the unclaimed Permanent Life Insurance Policy, the policy pertains to an unclaimed POD valued at USD with a bank in Lisbon, Portugal. Our deceased client was from Canada and worked with an Energy company here in Europe. He died alongside with the direct policy his wife and children were among the people that were confirmed dead in Indonesia Earthquake during family holiday in January. 
Since his death, no one has come forward for the policy benefit and all my efforts to locate his relatives have proved futile. The insurance company code stipulates that insured permanent policies not claimed must be turned over to the unclaimed policy division of the company after three years for onward transfer to the government as unclaimed.
We are seeking your consent to be in with us for the claim of this Insurance benefit. If you permit us to present you as the Insurance beneficiary, all proceeds will be processed and released to us. We will provide all the relevant documents to the claim and the policy benefit will be shared equally between us. 
Our law firm has the necessary documents to expedite the process in a highly professional and legal manner. The success rate is high and it may take up to fifteen business days to be concluded from the date we apply for the benefit.
Please let me know if you have any further questions or concerns. I look forward to hearing back from you soon.
Best wishes,
Amy
